column1: full outside off, and a bit of drift away. Driven to mid off
good length on off,and angling away. Left alone
full on off and seaming across. Tamim hammers it straight, but finds mid off
drops the length, on off, and Tamim rocks back and cuts exquisitely past point! First runs, first four.
full again, on middle and leg. Worked leg side
good length, on off, and he tries to cut, but too close to his body. Taken by the keeper
good length, wide outside off, too wide according to the umpire. A bit of swing away as Fakhar misses the cut
clobbered! Short, wide, and he stands tall before hammering a cut through the infield
good length, wide outside off again. This time Fakhar comes down the ground to generate some momentum but misses the shot. Umpire gives it as a wide again
slightly fuller, but still on a length outside off. Flays a cut to the off side and they scamper across for a single
good length, outside off. Angles slightly in. Tamim defends off the back foot
edged but falls short of the keeper. Good length, outside off, stays a bit low as he misses the drive. Takes an under-edge, but doesn't carry. Uneven bounce tonight?
good length, just outside off. Taps it with soft hands to the off side for a quick run
searing! Good length, just outside off, a bit of seam away as he misses the back-foot punch. Through to the keeper at a nice height
good length, on middle, and the ball goes down the leg side
good length, on middle. Angling down leg, and flicked to fine leg. Fielder there
good length, on middle, and flicked square on the leg side
slower ball, short too, just outside off. Tamim wants to cut it late but ends up smelling the leather instead. Has to sway away at the last moment to save his fingers
good length on off, and angling in. Mistimes the back foot punch to mid off for a quick one
back of a length, on off, and he rides the bounce before defending
good length, on middle. On his hips and flicked to square leg
pumped! Positive start to the over. Good length, on off, and he skips down the ground before hammering a shot over mid on
timed! Good length, outside off, and he stays in his crease before opening the bat's face late, and placing the cut behind point for another boundary
fuller, outside off and angling into the stumps. Guided to deep third man for a couple
back of a length, outside off, and he punches off the back foot. Finds cover
good length, on off, and he uncomfortably defends it back. A bit of extra bounce
full outside off, and the attempted drive is inside-edged to midwicket instead
rolls his fingers over the ball, back of a length outside off, and the ball stays low as Tamim misses the punch. Through to Walton
full, slow, and driven to mid on with gentle hands for a quick single
back of a length, outside off, and the cutter goes through to the keeper. No shot offered, he might've thought that was going to be a wide
full on middle, and nudged to mid on
slower ball, overpitched on middle. Tapped to mid on for a single
good length, outside off. Tries to cut but misses. Tamim going at a snail's pace
Tamim backs away before the bowler delivers, and he goes good length on off instead. Can't get bat on ball despite throwing his bat at it
good length on middle, and he's through the attempted pull early. Flat-bats it straight back, and it hits the stumps at the bowler's end
appeal for lbw but probably pitched outside leg. Good length, and he misses the flick. Hits his thigh guard and runs down to fine leg. Tamim adds two to the total but not to his personal tally

good length, on off and angling further away. Tamim skips down the wicket, but can't connect. Walton aims at the stumps because batsman is out of his crease, but doesn't hit. Umpire Aleem Dar gives it a wide
good length, on middle. Tries to one-hand-raised pull, but mistimed. Stopped at midwicket
a dropkick shot! And a pat on Tamim's back from Fakhar. In his toes, and flicked past the fielder at backward square leg in the deep
good length, on middle, and he swivels to pull but cramped for the shot, and through to the keeper
fullish, outside off, and he comes down the wicket to try and flay it square. Misses it altogether
good length, on middle. Flat-batted to mid on
slower ball, on middle and leg. Looks to work it leg side but a leading edge makes it go back towards the bowler
full on middle, and uppishly lifted over the bowler. Mistimed, actually, and that allows Tamim to take the second despite the ball going onto towards mid on
deposited! This time Tamim picked the slower ball early. Stays in the crease, and going across the line to pull in front of square
good length, on off and angling across. Guides a ramp to third man
good length, outside off from the offspinner around the wicket. Guided to midwicket
full and wide, and he drags a slog past the non-striker to long on
first six! And that's also the team fifty. Fullish outside off, comes down the wicket and gonig inside out over long off
good length, on middle. Punched off the back foot to deep midwicket
good length, wide outside off, and slapped past the sweeper-fielder on the off side! The runs are now flowing
full on middle, and he comes down the wicket, slightly cramped but goes through with the aggressive shot to long the left of long on. Babar runs across and ensures it doesn't go for four
nice, searing pace. Full on off and angling slightly away. Wants to drive but beaten by the pace
back of a length on leg. Wants to pull but can't connect. Hits him on the body. Ball was slightly slower too
back of a length, on leg. He drags a pull down, to the leg side
good length, on middle. Flays a punch to long on for a single
good length, outside off, and cut to point. They scamper across
full, just outside off. Presses forward to defend, but mistimes it onto his body. Can't pinch the single
good length, on middle, and he shapes up to pull, but the ball stays low and goes through to the keeper
full on off, and he skips down the ground before clobbering to mid off
back of a length, on leg and angling towards off. Wants to pull, but the ball goes over his bat
clears cover and no stopping that. Full and wide, and he slashes this with the open face of the bat. Once the infield was beaten, it had four written all over that
good length, on off. Raises his front leg to pull but can't connect. Another dot
good length, on middle. Mistimes the pull to deep midwicket

Tamim finally falls! Looks to clobber this length ball over deep midwicket but doesn't have the distance. Man in the deep takes a sharp catch. Bowler celebrates by revealing the Iron-Man shirt under his jersey
good length, angling in, and nudged off his hips to square leg for a single
length ball just outside off, and a sublime pull along the ground. Fielder there in the deep though

full, on middle, and he hits this in the air on the leg side. Lots of air time, and two men in the deep are getting together, but Iftikhar calls for it, and then takes the catch. Ball was swirling in the air. One gets two! Both openers gone.
worked off his pads to the leg side
full on off, and he presses forward to defend. Rolls away to cover. A brilliant over for Karachi Kings
and he strikes first ball! Full outside off, turning away, Hafeez comes down the wicket and looks to go big first ball. Sliced, and mid off gets under it. The Kings are roaring
good length, outside off from over the wicket. Flicked with the turn to square leg
full on off, and turning away. Patel wants to defend, edged and falls juuuust short of first slip. Imad tells slip that he should've stopped more ahead. Iftikhar the fielder
good length, outside off, and cut to point
good length, outside off, and cuts to point. Bit of a yes-no-yes-no from the batsmen but they complete the run
full, just outside off, and defended back to Imad
full outside off, and he comes down the wicket to clobber. Inside-edged, but not into the stumps
good length, outside off, and cut to point
full, on off, and pushed past the fielder at midwicket. Long on cleans up
full on off, and smacked with the turn to long off
full on middle, and he comes down the wicket to work it leg side. Hits his front leg and rolls away to the leg side
good length, outside off, and cut in front of square. Man at deep extra cover cleans up
good length, outside off, and he tiptoes to cut to deep point
shortish, on his body, and pulled well. But Sharjeel at deep midwicket, slices across the ground and stops the boundary
in the air and taken at fine leg! Cramps him with the short ball, and he top edges the shot. Was in trouble because of how close the ball was to his helmet
back of a length, on leg. Nudged to square leg
back of a length, on middle. Tries to pull, but gloves it instead. Past the keeper, and races away to fine leg for four
length ball, angling into his pads. Flicked to deep midwicket for two
left-arm seam is back, and yorker on leg stump. Hits his boot and rolls away. They pinch a run
good length, outside off from around the wicket. Cut to point but wants the single but Sohail is sent back
full just outside off, and hammered down the ground to long on
ramped! Short, outside off, and waits for the ball to come to him before slapping it to third man
yorker on leg, and he Natmegs it between his legs to short fine leg. Direct hit and Dunk would've been gone since he was out of his crease trying to take a run that wasn't there
yorker again. Dug away, just about
good length, on middle, and flicked to midwicket for a single
good length, on his body. Mistimes the pull into the vacant square leg region
back of a length, on off and coming into him. Mistimed to mid on
in the air and taken at deep midwicket! This was in the slot but the shot's been sliced. Babar gets under it. Arshad's second wicket tonight
good length, outside off. Punched to cover
good length outside off. Wants to defend off the back foot, but takes an edge and rolls down to third man
more of that, please! Team hundred too. Width offered, good length, and he slices a cut past Amir at third man. Amir has hurt his knee slightly while trying to field
slower ball, short on middle. Wiese wants to pull but he's through the shot too early
good length, outside off. Wants to cut, but can't time it
good length, on off. Pulled well, but along the ground
yorker length, just outside off. Sohail can't get bat on ball
good length, on middle, and he wants to pull, but goes over his head
full on leg, and flicked quite hard to the leg side. Protection at deep midwicket though
good length, on middle, and he flat-bats this down the ground to long on
full on leg, and he can't do more apart from clipping to deep midwicket
back of a length, on leg, and the batsman sways away from the ball's line. Through to Walton
slogs this slower ball to deep extra cover. No real timing because it'a slower ball that was angling away from Sohail
good length, on leg, and he swings leg side to find deep midwicket. Wiese keeps the strike
full on middle, and he goes for a wild heave, trying to clear deep midwicket. But in the air, and Rutherford runs to his right, settles under it, and dives forward to complete a difficult catch
yorker-ish, just outside off. Dug away to cover, but it's a no ball! Free hit incoming
plays it past short fine leg! Good length, angling into him, and he wants to pull, but hits his thigh and rolls away behind for a boundary
good length on off. Now allowing him to free his arms. Slapped to extra cover, gently enough, to come back for the second run
mistimed but falls short of deep midwicket runnning in. Mistimes the leg-side slog
good length, on middle. Wants to slog leg side but it takes a thick leading edge and Iftikhar gets under it in the deep. His third catch, Maqsood's second wicket
length ball, slow, outside off. Flayed to mid on, and Wiese keeps the strike for the final over
yorker, and dug away to short fine leg
shouts of catch it but it goes all the way for six. Good length, outside off, and he swings the bat leg-side, and gets enough to clear long on. An Afridi doing Afridi things
appeal for lbw, but missing the stumps down the leg side. Hits his pads, and they scamper across

back of a length, on middle. Mistimes the pull to deep midwicket, and Wiese wants the second but Afridi denies. Throw was so bad that it would've been a second. Sadly they chose not to and Afridi is now on strike. Reckon they should've just ran even if it meant Afridi's wicket was sacrificed
or maybe Afridi did the right thing? Improvised for four. Full and very wide, and Afridi walks across, opens the bat's face, and gets it over short third man
full on leg, and clubbed to deep midwicket. They come back for the second and Lahore finish on 134 for 7
half-volley at 140.6kph with a hint of swing to start. Sharjeel presses out towards extra cover and they race through for one
length ball pushed across Babar at 141.4kph. He pushes forwards to mid-off and they scramble through for one
length ball at 145.2kph, forced straight past the stumps. Mid-on gets round to field, and they scuttle through for one more

overpitched outside the off stump at 144.6kph and Babar plays a dreamy, flowing drive through cover point for four! Bit of a half-volley, and he squeezes this through the infield for the first boundary of the chase
creams four more through the covers! In the slot from Shaheen, and this is textbook Babar: a cover drive you would take out for dinner and bring home to your parents. Exquisite stuff
tidy finish to an expensive first over. No room this time, and Babar steers into the off side
full outside off, 139.1kph, and Sharjeel digs it out through the point region for four. Jammed his bat down on it, and squeezed it through the gap
back of a length, Sharjeel plays it to point on the bounce with a straight bat

back of a length, Sharjeel climbs into the pull and belts Rauf through midwicket for four more! What a start from Karachi... classic Sharjeel, waiting on the back foot and slugs hard in front of square
146.9kph, banged in on a hard length and beats Sharjeel's slash outside off
hits the pitch hard again, and Sharjeel deftly opens the face to run it down to third man for a jogged single
hard length on fourth stump, Babar defends on the back foot. Straight back to the bowler
yorker, bit of late tail, and Sharjeel jams the bat down on it. Squeezes it out towards midwicket, and they take a single
length ball, 141.5kph, and Babar looks to force another flowing drive through the covers. He doesn't pick his spot this time, and finds extra cover
dug in towards the waist, Babar flicks a pull out to deep midwicket
short outside off at 141.4kph. Sharjeel punches off the back foot, straight to the cover fielder inside the ring
pace off, 124.9kph in the channel on a length, and Sharjeel's tentative push can't make contact. First time Lahore have taken pace off the ball
looks for the yorker on off stump, but slightly overpitches and Sharjeel will press towards mid-on. Not timed, but they get one

Samit strikes first ball! Lahore have a breakthrough. Length ball outside off which sits up and pleads to be hit. Sharjeel rocks back, throws everything he has at it, but can only send a high chance to deep midwicket, where Fakhar Zaman takes an excellent catch on the rope
length in the channel, Hales punches through the covers off the back foot and times it nicely. Won't quite reach the boundary, but they get back for a third
length outside off, punched to extra cover on the back foot

speared down the leg side, Babar looks to heave through square leg but can't connect. Dunk whipped the bails off, but Babar's back foot was down. Given wide - thought it might have flicked the trouser
steered into the covers, can't find the gap
skips down the pitch so Samit drags his length back, and Babar wristily whips towards midwicket for a single. Good cat-and-mouse cricket
looks to work a single to the edge of the ring, but it's not there
full outside off, and mistimed to the leg side
good length, outside off. Hales wants to punch it through the covers but the ball goes past his outside edge
back of a length, angling into him. Opens the bat's face and guides it to third man
good length, on middle. Seaming in. Defended off the back foot. Overstepped though
bangs it in, outside off, and flat-batted in the air. Taken by Wiese at mid off, a catch, but remember that was a free hit.
full outside off, and caressed to wide mid off for a quick single
back of a length, outside off, and going over his head
good length, outside off, and clubbed off the back foot. Misfield at extra cover and they complete the run
good length, on off. Steps deep into his crease and pulls over midwicket. Protection in the deep though
full on middle, and a big stride forward. Pushed to mid on
overpitched on off, and he takes a big stride, meets the ball and sweeps confidently
full on leg. Giant stride, and defended
good length, on leg.Flicked to square leg for a quick single
good length, angling in. Flicked to square leg. Powerplay done
full just outside off, and he looks to drive, but the ball stays near the pitch. Nonetheless they scamper across
full just outside off, and driven wonderfully through the covers. But long off runs around to intercept
fullish, outside off, and he opens the bat's face and run it down to third man. Sharp work to stop the four
nudged to the leg side
slower ball, bit of a cutter and Hales is bowled! Through the bat-pad defense!
good length, outside off. Guided to point
good length, on middle. Pushed back to the bowler
full on off, and he takes a big stride to defend
full on leg, and clubbed with the full face of the bat to long on
good length on off, and some extra bounce. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
full, on off. Defended with the big stride
full on leg, and he closes the bat's face and drills it to deep midwicket
full on middle, and guided to the leg side
good length, outside off. Opens the bat's face and runs it down to third man
good length, ball sticks up. Clubs it leg-side to deep midwicket standing tall
full, just outside off. Defended with soft hands to the off side and they scurry for a single
lovely! Back of a length outside off. Wanted to pull but then chooses to wait for it, and opens the bat's face to guide it over the keeper's head
good length, just outside off. Runs it to third man
good length, on middle. Flicked off his hips to midwicket
good length, on leg. Flicked to deep backward square
full outside off, and driven to long off
good length, on leg. Goes deep in his crease and clips to deep midwicket
full, just outside off. Caresses a drive to long off
full outside off again. Big stride, square drive... six singles this over
full on leg, too wide outside the stumps. Wide given
length ball, just outside off. Opens the bat's face and pushes to cover for a quick one
good length, on middle. Pulled along the ground to deep backward square leg
good length, just outside off. Pushed to midwicket
up and over! In the slot, just outside off, punished. No long off, and he goes there
good length, outside off. Opens the bat's face and guides to the off side
good length, outside off. Pushed towards cover point
full outside off, and and crunched past the bowler's left to mid off. Dangerous run taken, successfully
good length, outside off, and he runs it down to third man
good length, wide outside off, and fiercely cut. Too good a shot for just a single
good length, on off. Pulled along the ground, behind square, but there's protection in the deep
good length, just outside off. Tries to cut, but  hit in front of square. Bowler scampers across to intercept
full, just outside off. Presses forward and defends, but can't get the single
overpitched, full ball, knuckle ball. Babar looks to tee off,but makes zero connection. Beaten by the (lack of) pace
good length outside off. He comes down the wicket and crunches a cut to deep point
slower ball, just outside off. Slogs across the line, and mistimes to deep midwicket
not full enough for the drive, but he tiries anyway. Mistimed to mid on
good length, just outside off. Opens the bat's face to run it down to third man
slower ball, good length on off. Looks to slog leg side but the ball goes under his bat. Dunk gets behind it
that will hurt Lahore Qalandars. Back of a length on middle, and it takes some extra bounce, right over the batsman's - and the keeper's - head.
full, on off. And Babar picks this from his pads, and flicks confidently over deep midwicket
back of a length, outside off. Worked to third man
aiming for the stumps, full on middle, and clipped off his pads to the leg side. They scramble across for a single
good length, on middle. Pushed to mid on
full on leg, and clipped to deep backward square
full on off, and flicked to deep backward square
back of a length, on off, and pulled between deep backward square and deep midwicket. But the fielder runs around and intercepts, and Babar scampers back for the second run
brilliant! Using the angle from the left-armer's around the wicket line. Angling down leg, and helped to fine leg for four
back of a length, stands tall and pulls to the deep midwicket gap! Babar gets his fifty... are we even surprised? His 5th this season
back of a length, on off. Fended off the back foot
yorker length, just outside off. Babar makes room to guide it fine but can't connect

lbw appeal....and given! Walton asks Babar if he should review but is advised against it. This was full on middle, he misses the flick, hits the outside of his back leg, and this should've hit the stumps. Fingers were raised nearly asap
full on off, and pushed to cover. Intercepted
full, on leg, and flicked to deep backward square leg
full outside off, and he presses forward to drive. Wasnt a single, but a wild throw, and poor back up allows them to take it anyway. Lahore getting frustrated now
full, just outside off, and driven straight back
good length, outside off. Wants to dab it fine, but doesn't get the direction. Ball rolls away near him
full, outside off. Comfortably caresses a drive to extra cover
worked away square off his hips with the ball angling in
good length, outside off. Dabbed to third man
clears mid off! This was a one-bounce four. Full outside off, and he mistimes the loft, but mid off was inside the circle, so eventually a very safe attempt. Nearly went for six
chipped! Full, on middle, and he checks a drive. Ball pops up,Wiese at mid on dives forward, and that's been taken
another chip, another wicket! Full on middle, and again trying to play this with hard hands. Pops in the air, and mid on takes a gentle catch. Haris on a hat-trick
back of a length, on middle. Fended off the back foot
good length, on middle. Pushed towards the off side but can't take the single
full on leg, and he flicks this soooo well! Nice use of the wrists to place it in front of deep midwicket
good length, outside off. And cut to deep point
yorker on off, and he toe-ends a drive back to Afridi
tries the yorker, on off, and clobbered to mid on. They scamper across for a dangerous one
yorker on middle, from around the wicket. Flicked to the leg side
the captain hits the winning runs! Punches this length ball through the covers. Karachi Kings are PSL 2020 champions
